boku: I (an informal equivalent of わたし used by men)
kimi: you (an informal equivalent of あなた used by men)
~kun: Mr. (an informal equivalent of ～さん used by men)
un: yes (an informal equivalent of はい)
uun: no (an informal equivalent of いいえ)
kocchi: this way, this place (an informal equivalent of こちら)
socchi: this way, that place (an informal equivalent of そちら)
acchi: this way, that place over there (an informal equivalent of あちら)
docchi: which one (between two things), which way,where (an informal equivalent of どちら)
kunikaeruno: Are you going back to your country?
